decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy B1, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | Notwithstanding the details of the depth of the extension shown on the submitted plans, which is not agreed at 3.78 metres on the boundary with No. 12 Keats Way, details showing the extension reduced in depth to 3.05 on this boundary with No. 12 shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the development being commenced, and the drawings/details as may subsequently be approved shall be implemented as approved and thereafter retained.  REASON:  In the interest of the amenity of the neighbouring occupiers at No. 12, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, H8, ES2, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9.
description: Ground floor extension to rear of house
